title: Best of The Herd for Oct 02, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Oct 02, 2020
description:
-Should the Jets move off of Sam Darnold for Trevor Lawrence?

-Kyrie Irving is the crazy guy at a party you don't want to talk to

-The Cowboys aren't seeing their offense the way they should

-Baker Mayfield needs to change his mentality


Guest: Albert Breer, The MMQB

Jordan Palmer, former NFL QB and now QB Coach



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
